children.subject: I've updated the post, but the deadline will be May 5. Hmm, we're going to see what we can do about the charge & will let you know!

1. When is the deadline to sign up? I'm not sure how many tickets I want to buy yet.

2. Is there a way of buying tickets without the service charge from this website? Also, even if I'm purchasing 0 tickets and trying to sign up for commencement alone, the website still says I have to pay a $2.30 service charge :(

you have the option of participating Spring 17, Fall 17, or Spring 18. 

The dept. commencement is only offered in Spring. Your name is read and you cross the stage. The general commencement is the one where your name is not read.
if we are graduating Fall 17, we attend this Spring Graduation? Is this the one where your walk on stage and receive a certificate or something? Or the one where we just watch a keynote speaker?

You can fill out your registration information and save the application without buying tickets yet. You can also purchase more than the initial 20 that are limited to you. It's a little complicated, but it is possible. @Emerald Templeton  can explain it a lot better than I can.
Any updates on how what we need to do to buy more tickets if we already registered?
@Lily Zhang  @Emerald Templeton  @Charlene Hughes
you should be able to go back into the system and edit your order to purchase more.
Are you able to purchase more tickets after initially registering?
Do you know if there's a way to rent graduation caps and gowns?

history.content:
Dear graduating seniors and graduates (including Summer 16, Fall 16, Sp 17, Summer 17, Fall 17):

The L&S CS Commencement will be held on May 17, 2017 at 2pm in the Greek Theater (for the first time!). If you would like to participate, please register & purchase tickets here by May 5. We will be using your answers in the survey to construct the commencement program, so please be sure to check your answers carefully!
If you are wondering about where to order your Cap & Gown, Graduation Announcements, Thank You cards, or assorted other graduation sundries, please begin your search at: http://commencement.berkeley.edu/getting-ready.
You can also visit the student stores in-person: 
  1. Cal Student Store, 2495 Bancroft Way, 510.229.4703
  2. The Student Store, 2480 Bancroft Way, 510.845.1226
 
Tickets to the L&S Commencement will be available for pick-up in L&S CS Advising Office at 377/379 Soda Hall, beginning the week of April 24.  All guests (besides graduates) must have a ticket to attend the commencement.
Tickets will not be sold at the door.

If you have any other questions please don't hesitate to let us know, and keep up the great work!

Best regards,
